event_variables.mission_id: identifier of mission that will be affected
event_variables.c_object_type: object type which is at collision risk with satellite

speed.relative_speed: relative speed between chaser & target at tca [m/s]

position.relative_position_r: relative position between chaser & target: radial [m]
position.relative_position_t: relative position between chaser & target: transverse (along-track) [m]
position.relative_position_n: relative position between chaser & target: normal (cross-track) [m]

velocity.relative_velocity_r: relative velocity between chaser & target: radial [m/s]
velocity.relative_velocity_t: relative velocity between chaser & target: transverse (along-track) [m/s]
velocity.relative_velocity_n: relative velocity between chaser & target: normal (cross-track) [m/s]

target_variables.t_span: size used by the collision risk computation algorithm [m] for the target object
target_variables.t_time_lastob_start: start of the time in days (with respect to the CDM creation epoch) of the last accepted observation used in the orbit determination of the target object
target_variables.t_time_lastob_end: end of the time in days (with respect to the CDM creation epoch) of the last accepted observation used in the orbit determination of the target object
target_variables.t_recommended_od_span: recommended length of update interval for orbit determination [days] for the target object
target_variables.t_actual_od_span: actual length of update interval for orbit determination [days] for the target object
target_variables.t_obs_available: number of observations available for orbit determination (per CDM) for the target object
target_variables.t_obs_used: number of observations used for orbit determination (per CDM) for the target object
target_variables.t_residuals_accepted: orbit determination residuals accepted for the target object
target_variables.t_weighted_rms: root-mean-square in least-squares orbit determination for the target object
target_variables.t_rcs_estimate: radar cross-sectional area [m2m2] estimate for the target object
target_variables.t_cd_area_over_mass: ballistic coefficient [m2m2/kg] estimate for the target object
target_variables.t_cr_area_over_mass: solar radiation coefficient . A/m (ballistic coefficient equivalent) estimate for the target object
target_variables.t_sedr: energy dissipation rate [W/kg] for the target object
target_variables.t_j2k_sma: semi-major axis [km] for the target object
target_variables.t_h_apo: apogee altitude [km] for the target object
target_variables.t_h_per: perigee altitude [km] for the target object

chaser_variables.c_span: size used by the collision risk computation algorithm (minimum 2 m diameter assumed for the chaser) [m] for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_time_lastob_start: start of the time in days (with respect to the CDM creation epoch) of the last accepted observation used in the orbit determination of the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_time_lastob_end: end of the time in days (with respect to the CDM creation epoch) of the last accepted observation used in the orbit determination of the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_recommended_od_span: recommended length of update interval for orbit determination [days] for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_actual_od_span: actual length of update interval for orbit determination [days] for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_obs_available: number of observations available for orbit determination (per CDM) for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_obs_used: number of observations used for orbit determination (per CDM) for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_residuals_accepted: orbit determination residuals accepted for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_weighted_rms: root-mean-square in least-squares orbit determination for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_rcs_estimate: radar cross-sectional area [m2m2] estimate for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_cd_area_over_mass: ballistic coefficient [m2m2/kg] estimate for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_cr_area_over_mass: solar radiation coefficient . A/m (ballistic coefficient equivalent) estimate for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_sedr: energy dissipation rate [W/kg] for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_j2k_sma: semi-major axis [km] for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_h_apo: apogee altitude [km] for the chaser object
chaser_variables.c_h_per: perigee altitude [km] for the chaser object

collision_variables.risk: self-computed value at the epoch of each CDM [base 10 log]
collision_variables.max_risk_estimate: maximum collision probability obtained by scaling combined covariance
collision_variables.max_risk_scaling: scaling factor used to compute maximum collision probability
collision_variables.miss_distance: relative position between chaser & target at tca [m]

standard-deviation.t_sigma_r: covariance; radial position standard deviation (sigma) [m] for target variable
standard-deviation.t_sigma_t: covariance; transverse (along-track) position standard deviation (sigma) [m] for target variable
standard-deviation.t_sigma_n: covariance; (cross-track) position standard deviation (sigma) [m] for target variable
standard-deviation.t_sigma_rdot: covariance; radial velocity standard deviation (sigma) [m/s] for target variable
standard-deviation.t_sigma_ndot: covariance; normal (cross-track) velocity standard deviation (sigma) [m/s] for target variable
standard-deviation.t_sigma_tdot: covariance; transverse (along-track) velocity standard deviation (sigma) [m/s] for target variable

velocity_velocity.t_cndot_rdot: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs radial velocity
velocity_velocity.t_cndot_tdot: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs transverse (along-track) velocity
velocity_velocity.t_ctdot_rdot: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) velocity vs radial velocity

position_position.t_cn_r: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) position vs radial position
position_position.t_cn_t: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) position vs transverse (along-track) position
position_position.t_ct_r: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) position vs radial position

position_velocity.t_crdot_r: covariance; correlation of radial velocity vs radial position
position_velocity.t_crdot_t: covariance; correlation of radial velocity vs transverse (along-track) position
position_velocity.t_crdot_n: covariance; correlation of radial velocity vs normal (cross-track) position
position_velocity.t_ctdot_r: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) velocity vs radial position
position_velocity.t_ctdot_t: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) velocity vs transverse (along-track) position
position_velocity.t_ctdot_n: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) velocity vs normal (cross-track) position
position_velocity.t_cndot_n: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs normal (cross-track) position
position_velocity.t_cndot_r: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs radial position
position_velocity.t_cndot_t: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs transverse (along-track) position

standard-deviation.c_sigma_r: covariance; radial position standard deviation (sigma) [m] for chaser variable
standard-deviation.c_sigma_t: covariance; transverse (along-track) position standard deviation (sigma) [m] for chaser variable
standard-deviation.c_sigma_n: covariance; (cross-track) position standard deviation (sigma) [m] for chaser variable
standard-deviation.c_sigma_rdot: covariance; radial velocity standard deviation (sigma) [m/s] for chaser variable
standard-deviation.c_sigma_ndot: covariance; normal (cross-track) velocity standard deviation (sigma) [m/s] for chaser variable
standard-deviation.c_sigma_tdot: covariance; transverse (along-track) velocity standard deviation (sigma) [m/s] for chaser variable

velocity_velocity.c_cndot_rdot: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs radial velocity
velocity_velocity.c_cndot_tdot: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs transverse (along-track) velocity
velocity_velocity.c_ctdot_rdot: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) velocity vs radial velocity

position_position.c_cn_r: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) position vs radial position
position_position.c_cn_t: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) position vs transverse (along-track) position
position_position.c_ct_r: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) position vs radial position

position_velocity.c_crdot_r: covariance; correlation of radial velocity vs radial position
position_velocity.c_crdot_t: covariance; correlation of radial velocity vs transverse (along-track) position
position_velocity.c_crdot_n: covariance; correlation of radial velocity vs normal (cross-track) position
position_velocity.c_ctdot_r: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) velocity vs radial position
position_velocity.c_ctdot_t: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) velocity vs transverse (along-track) position
position_velocity.c_ctdot_n: covariance; correlation of transverse (along-track) velocity vs normal (cross-track) position
position_velocity.c_cndot_n: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs normal (cross-track) position
position_velocity.c_cndot_r: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs radial position
position_velocity.c_cndot_t: covariance; correlation of normal (cross-track) velocity vs transverse (along-track) position

additional_external_variables.F10: 10.7 cm radio flux index [10−2210−22 W/(m2m2 Hz)]
additional_external_variables.F3M: 81-day running mean of F10.7 (over 3 solar rotations) [10−2210−22 W/(m2m2 Hz)]
